<title level="1" pfs="">[Tax Collector](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3548)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ledgers and marks, positive and negative flows, and levies and allotments are a tax collector's daily bread. Where coin is gained, from whom it's collected, and to whom it's disbursed are their concerns—not who can afford the taxes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Tax Collector](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3548)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 109

**Perception** +6; (DC 19 against [Stealing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2410)) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +8, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +9, [Mercantile Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +10, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +9, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Financial Specialist** When dealing with matters of taxes and finance, the tax collector is a 3rd-level challenge.

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), collection of expired documents with intact seals, [Merchant's Scale](/Equipment.aspx?ID=34), [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3), tax documents in scroll case

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 6

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +5 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Glittering Distraction** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The tax collector Strides. At any point during this movement, they can Interact to hurl a handful of coins. If there are commoners about, this typically causes a scene. Crowds are usually [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) and [have other effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=2796).

</column>
